mapper.select: SELECT p.product_seq, p.category_seq, c.category_name, p.sector_seq, p.grade_seq, p.user_seq, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_status, p.register_date, p.update_date, p.product_amount FROM product p inner join category c on p.category_seq = c.category_seq WHERE p.product_status = #{status}
SELECT g.grade_seq, g.category_seq, g.grade_name, g.brix AS birix_value, c.category_name FROM grade g INNER JOIN category c ON g.category_seq = c.category_seq WHERE g.category_seq = #{categorySeq}

SELECT sector_seq, sector_name, volume FROM sector WHERE
volume >= #{productAmount}

update.foreach: UPDATE product SET sector_seq = #{item.sectorSeq}, grade_seq = #{item.gradeSeq}, product_status = #{item.productStatus}, update_date = now() WHERE product_seq = #{item.productSeq}

mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO product_log ( product_seq, status, log_amount ) VALUES
(#{item.productSeq}, #{item.productStatus}, #{item.productAmount})
mapper.select: select user_seq from user where id =#{id}
